amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the Department of Defense from obligating or expending funds on certain green energy mandates found in various provisions of U.S. Code and two Executive Orders.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 32 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit the Department of Defense from obligating or expending funds on certain green energy mandates found in various provisions of US Code and two Executive Orders.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 197 (Roll no. 322).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 197 (Roll no. 322).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. McClintock.
